name: Adventurer
header: Adventurers find excitement and thrill in exploration and dare to discover the unknown.
description: The Adventurer archetype is all about freedom. They feel alive and connected when they are out in nature. It’s like they’re constantly being pulled to the outdoors or onto a journey of some kind — especially into the unknown.

name: Backpacker
header: The backpacker tries to experience the local life as if they live it along with its inhabitants and are not into luxury holidays.
description: The Backpacker archetype usually stay in inexpensive hotels like hostels.

name: Luxury
header: The luxury traveller enjoys travelling with a great deal of comfort and quality, without any stress or hassle whatsoever.
description: They also expect an elevated travel experience with minimum vexation and maximum amenities

name: Family
header: The family traveller look to not only build life long memories.
description: They also break their family away from the usual routine, opening their minds to new cultures, foods and experiences.
